frontmatter.title: Values Based Leadership for the Modern Age
frontmatter.short: Leaders provide stability in an unstable environment, inspire teams to achieve great things. Embrace values-based leadership to create a culture of trust in your organization from employees to shareholders, better decision-making,greater creativity and innovation.
frontmatter.keywords: business intelligence reporting, data driven decision making, data driven decisions, using data to make decisions
